assistants.description: Suggests assistants based on current task

assistants.description: Shows breadcrumb path across assistant use

assistants.name: Usage Analytics Panel
assistants.description: Displays usage, validation, and status per tool

assistants.name: Theme Switcher
assistants.description: Changes assistant UI appearance by mode

assistants.name: Quick Assistant Finder
assistants.description: Search bar for assistants by function/tag

assistants.name: Launch Reminder System
assistants.description: Notifies you to reuse tools not recently touched

assistants.name: UI Summary Snapshot
assistants.description: Shows assistant’s config + function in compact view
